property.name: color
property.description: The text color used for the text field and the drop-down list of a Combo.

property.name: background-color
property.description: The background color used for the text field and the drop-down list of a Combo.

property.name: font
property.description: The font used for the text field and the drop-down list of a Combo.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around a Combo.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

element.name: Combo-Button
element.description: The drop-down button of RWT Combo.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image or gradient for combo drop-down button.

property.name: background-color
property.description: The background color of the drop-down button of the Combo.

property.name: border
property.description: The border of the drop-down button of the Combo.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: cursor
property.description: Combo button cursor.

property.name: width
property.description: The width of the drop-down button of the Combo.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over the combo button.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies when the button is disabled.

state.name: pressed
state.description: Applies while a button is pressed.

property.name: background-image
property.description: The icon for the Combo drop-down button.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over the combo button.

element.name: Combo-Field
element.description: The text field of RWT Combo.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding (inner distance) for combo text field.

property.name: border
property.description: The border of the list of the Combo.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: box-shadow
property.description: The shadow behind the combos list.

element.name: Combo-FocusIndicator
element.description: The frame that is drawn when the combo is focused.

property.name: background-color
property.description: The fill-color of the frame.

property.name: border
property.description: The border of the frame. 3D-styles inset, outset, etc are not supported.

property.name: margin
property.description: The margin between the combos border and the frame.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the indicator. A value between 0 and 1.
